snippet.title: Lost Castle 2 Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Lost Castle 2 is a 2D Beat'em up Rogue-Lite game coming to Steam Early Access July 25th 2024. Explore solo or in multiplayer to find abundant treasures and items to enhance yourself, master various weapons to showcase your skills, and challenge powerful monsters to demonstrate your strength.

Wishlist us on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2445690/Lost_Castle_2/
Follow us on X - https://x.com/LostCastle2Game
